column5: I started out the trout opener by my oldest waking me up to go fishing   We headed out around 8:30 to a spot 5 minutes from the house. I never really have any luck there for trout but today turned out to be a great day.  First spot I had a couple hits but nothing landed so we decided to try out our WGSF spot and ended up catching 16 between the 2 of us in the the hour. I love the colors on these little Browns, just wish I brought the good camera with us but the Blackberry does the job.              Off to Long Point for some perch with Jacob tomorrow!
Awesome, his smile says it all
nice trout, I took my boy out this morning too but since the rivers down here are high and dirty it ended up just being a walk
It's always nice to get out with the kids.  Love the spots on those fish too

Amazing what you can find close to home! I think I scouted that little stream driving about town with our youngest a few months ago..  He'll talk about that day for a long time Dan... you'll talk about it for the rest of your life!
That's awesome Dan Priceless moments between you and your boy Just doesn't get any better than that Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great stuff Dan
Good report, looked like fun. I got out today and caught a nice rainbow...would post a report but I'm afraid too  Thanks for sharing,  MTBF
Saw these on FB this morning nice brown Jacob got there looks like a good day
Thats awsesome Dan An opener venture,  that you and your son will never forget
Thats the best pic right there. Make me waiting for my time with the grandson.  TFS Dan
Thanks everyone, Hopefully we'll have another report tomorrow!
from ALL the threads in this forum..this is the first link i clicked on for an openerer report...  Job Well Done !!!!
A couple of them pictures are priceless, Tight Lines tomorrow SBK
way to go dan just like mastercard priceless
Went out this aft as well with the whole gang, after forgetting the boat keys when I went to Long Point      Jamie reeled in his first fish ever    He didn't like it so much after he felt the slime
that second shot from today is great . Time for a spare boat key in the vehicle. Doncha just hate when that happens...........
There usually is a spare set in there, but I threw them in my mom's truck on Friday
Nice report Dan Never get enough of seeing the pure joy on the face of a child when they catch a fish with thier dad.Happy easter my friend   Paul
Thanks Dan!
